name: Remember 11: The Age of Infinity
description:
Remember 11: The Age of Infinity is an adventure game developed by KID. It was originally released in 2004. KID published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Remember 11: The Age of Infinity on PC, PlayStation 2, PSP and iOS.
Takumi Nakazawa directed the game. It was scored by Chiyomaru Shikura and Takeshi Abo.
